speaker: Alma
dialogue: It’s been a week and still no mail…

speaker: CC
dialogue: Well, we can’t be sitting around and being mopey, can we?

speaker: Alma
dialogue: Like when Ryan started pouting that we hadn’t gotten him that...what was it again?

speaker: Alma
dialogue: I kept asking him, “Honey, why would you want to be a goat in a video game when you could just be a little boy?”

speaker: Alma
dialogue: He just told me I wouldn’t get it because I was an adult. I guess that’s the cross I have to bear now.

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: I just told him goat puns until he got mad and said, “Maya, let’s go into our rooms away from the -adults.-”

speaker: Alma
dialogue: I kinda feel like a bad parent.

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: No way! You’re the best mom that ever mommed.

speaker: Alma
dialogue: Well, Ryan did end up buying it with his allowance… I’m glad he finally got it.

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: And with his own money, no doubt!

speaker: Alma
dialogue: Speaking of Christmas, [], cut out these Christmas cards if you wouldn’t mind.
